Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Notably , although the absorption profile of PCDSeBT is similar to that of the thiophene analogue , PCDTBT , the absorption onset of PCDSeBT is significantly red - shifted by ∼ 70 nm , corresponding to a lower optical bandgap ( E g opt = 1.70 eV ) than PCDTBT ( E g opt = 1.85 eV ).

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PCDSeBT |
| the thiophene analogue, PCDTBT |
| a lower optical bandgap (Eg opt = 1.70 eV) than PCDTBT |
| PCDTBT (Eg opt = 1.85 eV) |

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.
